labels.label: Consume from NYC Kafka: Topic *retail-store (data produced in NYC & Paris)
Consumer from Paris Kafka: Topic nyc__retail (validate replication)
Failover Consumer to consume from Paris Kafka: NYC DC is lost forever
Produce to NYC Kafka Cluster if available, otherwise produce to Paris (Retail-Store)
Consume from NYC Kafka: Topic retail-web (data produced in NYC)
Produce to NYC Kafka Cluster if available, otherwise produce to Paris
Consume from Paris Kafka: Topic retail-web (data produced in Paris)
Cross DC Consumer Group. Each message is consumed in one DC only (Retail Web)

processGroups.name: Active Active Cross DC Consumer Group

labels.label: Produce to NYC Kafka Cluster if available, otherwise produce to Paris
Consume from Paris Kafka: Topic *retail-store (data produced in Paris & NYC)
Consume from NYC Kafka: Topic *retail-store (data produced in NYC & Paris)
XDCR: Cross DC Replication. Each message is consumed in every DC (Retail POS)
